text: Abul Maal Abdul Muhith (; 25 January 1934 â€“ 30 April 2022) was a Bangladeshi economist, writer, and politician. He was Bangladesh's Finance Minister from January 2009 until January 2019. Muhith was also a member of the Jatiya Sangsad from 2009 until 2018. He was a member of the Awami League. Muhith was born in Sylhet, Bangladesh. Muhith went in the hospital in Dhaka, Bangladesh in March 2022. He died on 30 April 2022 at the age of 88. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Bangladeshi writers Category:Bangladeshi economists Category:Politicians from Sylhet Division
title: Abul Maal Abdul Muhith
